summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Data Analytics Portfolio application. Backend APIs are 88.9% functional (16/18 tests passed) with all core functionality working. Frontend is fully functional with all pages, navigation, charts, and interactive elements working properly. AI insights integration with GPT-5.2 is operational.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 for successful creation
minor_bugs.impact: Cosmetic - operation succeeds but wrong status code

ui_bugs.issue: Console warnings about chart dimensions (-1 width/height)
ui_bugs.impact: Console warnings only, charts render correctly

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with sidebar navigation and KPI cards
Overview page shows revenue trend chart and customer segments
Financial Analytics page with filtering and metrics table
Customer Analytics page with segment visualization
AI Insights page - generate insights button and form functionality
Reports page - business framing form and PDF export button
Data Management page - seed data and view metrics
Navigation between all pages works smoothly
PDF export generates 2814 byte PDF file
AI insights generation works with GPT-5.2
All interactive buttons and forms functional
